title: EYL #149 Joy Taylor on Broadcasting, & The Business of Sports
itunes:title: EYL #149 Joy Taylor on Broadcasting, & The Business of Sports
description:
Joy Taylor has established herself as one of the top voices in sports. As the co-host of The Herd on FOX Sports, she reaches millions of people daily. 


On episode 149, she broke down the sports broadcasting industry, she spoke about being a woman in the male dominated sports world, we also covered branding, marketing, and the business of sports. #joyTaylor #sports #broadcasting 


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Link to Investfest: https://investfest.com/


Host IG: https://instagram.com/bankgreenwood?utm_medium=copy_link


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/joytaylortalks?utm_medium=copy_link

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
